data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh to strong easterly airstream will affect the coast of southern China today and tomorrow. There will be one or two rain patches over the region. Under the influence of the northeast monsoon, the weather over the coast of Guangdong will be slightly cooler in the morning and brighter midweek this week. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Kalmaegi will intensify gradually today. It will move across the central and southern parts of the South China Sea in the middle and latter parts of this week in the general direction of the vicinity of Vietnam, a broad band of clouds will cover the northern part of the South China Sea and the coast of Guangdong by then.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251103","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Bright periods during the day.
